structure.unit: B FERTILIZER AND PESTICIDE USE AND APPLICATION

law.text: This chapter shall be administered by the Department of Agriculture, hereinafter referred to as the department.
law.history: Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 295, sec. 62, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 148, sec. 1. -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 130, sec. 2.
